timeline.bodyText: We need a new row in this table that specifies the version support from 2.20 (or whatever version we release this change with) going forward.

replies.bodyText: This has been addressed in #10945 and updated in this PR. 2.21.0 will be the first version without 1.7 and with 1.10 support.
